Tunable.name: AGE_PROGRESS_UPDATE_TIME
Tunable.description: The update rate, in Sim Days, of age progression in the UI.

TunableList.name: AGE_SPEED_SETTING_MULTIPLIER
TunableList.description: A mapping between age speeds and the multiplier that those speeds correspond to.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: The age speed that will be mapped to its multiplier.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: The multiplier by which to adjust the lifespan based on user age speed settings. Setting this to 2 for 'Slow' speed will double the Sim's age play time in that setting.

Tunable.name: AGE_SUPPRESSION_ALARM_TIME
Tunable.description: Amount of time in sim seconds to suppress aging.

TunableList.name: AGING_DATA
TunableList.description: On a per-species level, define all age-related data.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: The species this aging data applies to.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: Control how Sims age. The tuning defines what ages are available to them, and how aging is applied to and affects them.

Tunable.name: age_up_interaction
Tunable.description: The default interaction that ages Sims up. This is called when Sims auto-age or when the "Age Up" cheat is invoked.

TunableList.name: ages
TunableList.description: All available ages for this Sim, and any data associated with that specific age.

TunableEnum.name: key
TunableEnum.description: The available age for the Sim.

TunableTuple.name: value
TunableTuple.description: Any further data associated with this age.

Tunable.name: cas_icon
Tunable.description: Icon to be displayed in the ui for the age.

Tunable.name: cas_icon_selected
Tunable.description: Icon to be displayed in the UI for the age when buttons are selected.

Tunable.name: cas_name
Tunable.description: The name to be displayed in the UI for the age.

Tunable.name: personality_trait_count
Tunable.description: The number of traits available to a Sim of this age.

Tunable.name: transition
Tunable.description: The transition data associated with this age, such as dialogs, notifications, durations, etc...

TunableList.name: bonus_days
TunableList.description: Specify how much bonus time is added to elder Sims possessing these traits.

Tunable.name: key
Tunable.description: The trait associated with this modifier.

Tunable.name: value
Tunable.description: The modifier associated with this trait.

Tunable.name: old_age_interaction
Tunable.description: The default interaction that transitions a Sim from old age to death.

TunableEnum.name: old_age_npc_death_type_fallback
TunableEnum.display: Old Age Npc Death Type Fallback
TunableEnum.description: Used if the Old Age Interaction is not a death interaction. In that case, the non-instanced NPCs are not running the interaction but also can't get their death type from the interaction's tuning. This value is used as a fallback. The NPC's death type set to this value, and it will effectively become a ghost.

Tunable.name: AGING_SAVE_LOCK_TOOLTIP
Tunable.description:
The tooltip to show in situations where save-lock during Age Up is necessary, i.e. when babies or non-NPC Sims age up.
This tooltip is provided one token: the Sim that is aging up.
